text: Came across an ad from ewineasia with a masterclass. Was wondering if the 4 samples of wine will be fresh and still good by the time of the class. The wine samples got delivered a few hours before the class. The class was very informative and well executed (through zoom) and the wines was so good I had to buy 2 bottles. Signed up for their next class too!

I had the privilege to visit their warehouse today and take in their carefully curated selection of wines. I was fortunate to meet Melvin, who was very helpful and knowledgeable and also kind enough to help expand my horizons with some excellent recommendations. It was a great experience also because of the friendly staff and owner, Susy. Excellent way to spend a sunday!

Love this supplier. Great selection of wines. I really like discovering new ones  which is pretty easy with Ewine Asia as they deals with small vineries who treat their production with true love. We keep discovering gems to enjoy.  Great value for money. The staff is very insightful and go les out of their way to help. Agnes and Daniel specially.

best wine store in singapore, with excellent variety of high quality wines and temperature controlled supply chain to maintain quality from winery to store.  love the organic biodynamics and old world wines.
My go to for Italian wines here in Singapore. Excellent team, always responsive and they have great product!  The key to any good dinner party ðŸ™‚
